sentences.en: As a result, it is very necessary to reexamine the documents that have been neglected.
sentences.cn: 因此, 对许多旧有的却被忽视的史料做重新审视的工作,就显得尤为必要.

sentences.en: B > Perhaps it is time to reexamine the idea that college degrees are a guarantee of intelligence.
sentences.cn: 也许现在是应该重新考虑大学为是智力的保证这种想法的时候了.

sentences.en: For this reason, I oftensuffer and endeavour to reexamine myself.
sentences.cn: 我因此也时时煞了苦痛, 努力的要想到我自己.

sentences.en: If the goal wasn't exciting, then I'd reexamine my goal on the card for a while.
sentences.cn: 如果目标不够刺激, 那么我就重新检查一下我卡上的目标.

sentences.en: In a period a fast development, we must reexamine all the problems, including technique innovation.
sentences.cn: 在现代化快速发展的时代, 我们必须重新审视包括技术创新在内的一切问题.

sentences.en: In Chapter 9, we reexamine the historical deveopment and applications of Network Techniques.
sentences.cn: 在第九章我们进一步回顾网络技术的发展史和应用情况.

sentences.en: It passed the reexamine of metrological certification and authorization.
sentences.cn: 1999年通过计量认证和授权的复审.

sentences.en: Mandated reductions have forced manufacturers to reexamine the diesel engine combustion process to discover answers.
sentences.cn: 授权降低对种职能,厂家不得不重新审视柴油发动机燃烧过程中发现的答案.

sentences.en: Perhaps it is time reexamine the idea that college degrees are a guarantee of intelligence.
sentences.cn: 大概目前是应该重新琢磨大学为是智力的包管这种想法的时候了.

sentences.en: Perhaps it is time reexamine the idea that.
sentences.cn: 也许现在是应该重新考虑.的时候了.

sentences.en: Reexamine compensation - what is it offering incentives for?
sentences.cn: 重新审视赔偿 - 这是什么奖励 呢 ?

sentences.en: The group fails to reexamine those alternatives originally disfavored by the majority.
sentences.cn: 团体轻易放弃那些不被大多数成员所接受的选择方案.

sentences.en: Therefore, it is necessary to reexamine the connotation and relationship of them.
sentences.cn: 因此, 我们需要在复杂性的意义上重新审视“基础”与“创新”的内涵及其关系.

sentences.en: They do not reexamine their reasoning even when they emerge with conclusions are absurd.
sentences.cn: 即使他们得出来的结论看上去就很荒唐,他们也不会重新检查自己的推导过程.

sentences.en: We may reexamine our goals or our methods for attaining our goals.
sentences.cn: 我们可能会重新审视我们的目标或我们实现目标的方法。
